snippet.title: Karateka: Official Trailer (2012)
snippet.description:
The launch trailer for the 2012 Steam remake of Karateka, the 8-bit karate classic by Prince of Persia creator Jordan Mechner.

You can read about the making of the original Karateka and buy the game at https://www.jordanmechner.com/projects/karateka

Trailer directed by Adam Lisagor.
